title: akhilANDeshvari
sahitya:
akhilANDEshvari annaiyE ANDaruLvAi aDimai ennaiyE shrI


anupallavi

  mahitalam pugazhum jambukEshvaram vaLar jaganmAtA uLamirangAdA


caraNam    singavAhani Or shilandiyum mukti shErndadhu kETTunran sannidhi shErndEn
ranganAtha pAghini pApa mOcani rAmadAsan paNi rAjivalOcani
